title: Boots of Ostara
summaries: The Boots of Ostara are a drop from the boss Lepus. They provide 3 defense to the player and create grass on dirt when worn. The Boots of Ostara will also enable the wearer to perform "bunny hops" where each successive jump in a series will increase in height until a maximum height of 16 blocks is reached. The Boots also give a green particle effect when jumping.

statistics.Tooltip: Fertilizes the soil and allows the wearer to perform a bunny hop
statistics.Sell: 1
